channel.title: [Joke Class] The Narrator
channel.description:
The Narrator
(Neutral Special)
Passive : Omnipotent | On the first night , he will die. He will appear as a random class. Can still perform actions.
Day Ability 1: Back on Track : Force everyone to use their day ability on a target. A message will appear saying Narrator : At this moment, the court decided to use all their abilities in a fight. (2 uses)
Day Ability 2 : Memes OUT | Prince cannot die N1 , Knights cannot be executed as long as it is the year 2018 and all Neutrals will kill their attackers if they die. If BD mislynches, the first victim will survive its lynching. Narrator: Look , i'm tired of all this meming. Happy now? ( 1use)
Night Ability 1 : Quotation Destruction | Force all whispers to be public the next day. (3 uses) Night Ability 2 : 1.2.3. Break. 5.| Choose a target . They will be able to look through the eyes of the Narrator for a day , before going back to their body , they will not be able to use day or night abilities. (1 use)
Goal: Make an amazing story.

item.title: [Joke Class] The Narrator
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
4D chess is not a good story for that very reason

The Narrator

(Neutral Special)

Passive : Omnipotent | On the first night , he will die. He will appear as a random class. Can still perform actions.

Day Ability 1: Back on Track : Force everyone to use their day ability on a target. A message will appear saying
Narrator : At this moment, the court decided to use all their abilities in a fight. (2 uses)

Day Ability 2 : Memes OUT | Prince cannot die N1 , Knights cannot be executed as long as it is the year 2018 and all Neutrals will kill their attackers if they die. If BD mislynches, the first victim will survive its lynching.
Narrator: Look , i’m tired of all this meming. Happy now? ( 1use)

Night Ability 1 : Quotation Destruction | Force all whispers to be public the next day. (3 uses)
Night Ability 2 : 1.2.3. Break. 5.| Choose a target . They will be able to look through the eyes of the Narrator for a day , before going back to their body , they will not be able to use day or night abilities. (1 use)
